statements: SELECT * FROM project_updates
SELECT update_id, update_description, update_date FROM project_updates WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT project_id, update_date FROM project_updates WHERE update_description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM project_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT project_id, COUNT(update_id) AS total_updates FROM project_updates GROUP BY project_id
SELECT * FROM project_updates WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT update_description, update_date FROM project_updates WHERE update_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM project_updates WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT project_id, update_description FROM project_updates WHERE recipient_email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT update_id, update_description, recipient_email FROM project_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_updates WHERE project_id = 10;
SELECT update_message, send_date FROM project_updates WHERE update_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM team_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT notification_message, send_date FROM team_notifications WHERE notification_id = 3;
SELECT notification_id, team_member_id, notification_type FROM team_notifications;
SELECT update_id, project_id, update_message, send_date FROM project_updates WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY send_date DESC
SELECT * FROM project_updates WHERE update_id = 10
SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM project_updates GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY total_updates DESC
SELECT DISTINCT notification_type FROM team_notifications
SELECT * FROM team_notifications WHERE send_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT member_id, member_name, email_address FROM TeamMembers
SELECT email_address, phone_number, member_name FROM TeamMembers
SELECT update_description, update_date, update_title FROM ProjectUpdates
SELECT update_title, project_id, update_date FROM ProjectUpdates
SELECT member_name, email_address FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_id = 1
SELECT member_id, member_name FROM TeamMembers WHERE email_address = 'example@example.com'
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers INNER JOIN ProjectUpdates ON TeamMembers.member_id = ProjectUpdates.project_id
SELECT project_id, update_title FROM ProjectUpdates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY update_date DESC
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT member_name, email_address FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_updates WHERE project_id = 1001;
SELECT alert_message, alert_priority FROM project_alerts WHERE alert_priority = 'High';
SELECT member_name, log_time FROM team_members JOIN alert_logs ON team_members.member_id = alert_logs.member_id;
SELECT * FROM project_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM project_alerts GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_alerts > 3;
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT project_id, alert_priority FROM project_alerts ORDER BY alert_priority ASC, project_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(log_time) AS latest_log_time FROM alert_logs WHERE alert_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM Projects WHERE project_manager = 1;
SELECT member_name, email FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, deadline, project_manager FROM Projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_id, alert_message, alert_date FROM Alerts WHERE update_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT project_name, start_date, project_manager FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, email, phone_number FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, deadline, member_name FROM Projects p JOIN TeamMembers tm ON p.project_manager = tm.member_id;
SELECT DISTINCT project_id, alert_message FROM Projects p JOIN Alerts a ON p.project_id = a.project_id;
